page.title: 08FARMING..ELMWOOD COLLEGE
page.content: Elmwood college offers local farmers advice on a range of farming matters. 1.There is a potato seed rate computer program.The program can be used to decide the quantity of seed required and the distance for tuber planting. 2.By dialling Cupar 55526 farmers can listen to a 3 minute recording which advises them about crop diseases and spraying routines.The tape is changed weekly. 3.Advice is given about cereal varieties to help farmers get the best possible yield. Popular {spring varieties}are GOLF, KLAXON,GOLDEN PROMISE. Popular winter wheat varieties are AVALON,BRIGAND,GALAHAD. Popular winter barley varieties are PANDA,HALCYON,GERBEL. Popular{oat}varieties are MATRA,DULA.
